name: INDIA TRIBAL CARE TRUST
briefDescription: Starting from Purulia - Bankura - Jhargram belt we are tying up with Government schools to impart quality education to class 9th and 10th in English, Maths, Science and Value Education.Presently tie up with 5 schools in Purulia spanning 400 students.Targetting hostel and education for 1000 students in the next 3 years for 11th, 12th and graduation with a reach out of 5000 through school tie ups in tribal belts.Two primary English Medium day schools at Purulia and Ananda bazar with strengths 100 & 165 respectively
